Uses of Class
edu.rit.pj2.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.gpu.example
    Package edu.rit.gpu.example contains example programs illustrating how to do GPU parallel programming with the Parallel Java 2 Library.
    edu.rit.gpu.test
    Package edu.rit.gpu.test contains unit test programs for the classes in package edu.rit.gpu.
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.
    edu.rit.pj2.example
    Package edu.rit.pj2.example contains example programs illustrating how to do parallel programming with the Parallel Java 2 Library.
    edu.rit.pjmr
    Package edu.rit.pjmr contains Parallel Java Map Reduce (PJMR), a simple parallel map-reduce framework built on top of Parallel Java 2.

    • Uses of Task in edu.rit.gpu.example

      Subclasses of Task in edu.rit.gpu.example 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KnapsackBnbGpu
      Class KnapsackBnbGpu is a GPU parallel program that solves a knapsack problem using a branch-and-bound search.
      class  KnapsackExhGpu
      Class KnapsackExhGpu is a GPU parallel program that solves a knapsack problem using an exhaustive search.
      class  OuterProductGpu
      Class OuterProductGpu is a GPU parallel program that calculates the outer product matrix of two vectors.
      class  OuterProductSeq
      Class OuterProductSeq is a sequential program that calculates the outer product matrix of two vectors.
      class  PiGpu
      Class PiGpu is a GPU parallel that calculates an approximate value for π using a Monte Carlo technique.
      class  PiGpu2
      Class PiGpu2 is a GPU parallel program that calculates an approximate value for π using a Monte Carlo technique.
      class  Powers
      Class Powers is a GPU parallel program that calculates the square root, cube root, square, and cube of the numbers from 1 to N.
      class  WalkSackGpu
      Class WalkSackGpu is a GPU parallel program that solves a knapsack problem using a random walk.
      class  ZombieGpu
      Class ZombieGpu is a GPU parallel program to compute the motion of a group of zombies.
      class  ZombieGpu2
      Class ZombieGpu2 is a GPU parallel program to compute the motion of a group of zombies.

    • Uses of Task in edu.rit.gpu.test

      Subclasses of Task in edu.rit.gpu.test 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Test01
      Class Test01 is a unit test main program that adds two integer vectors on the GPU.
      class  Test02
      Class Test02 is a unit test main program that adds two float vectors on the GPU.
      class  Test03
      Class Test03 is a unit test main program that adds two long vectors on the GPU.
      class  Test04
      Class Test04 is a unit test main program that adds two double vectors on the GPU.
      class  Test05
      Class Test05 is a unit test main program that adds two integer vectors on the GPU.
      class  Test06
      Class Test06 is a unit test main program that adds two double matrices on the GPU.

    • Uses of Task in edu.rit.pj2

      Methods in edu.rit.pj2 with type parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Job.masterFor(int lb, int ub, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add a master-worker cluster parallel for loop to this job, with a loop index of type int.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Job.masterFor(long lb, long ub, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add a master-worker cluster parallel for loop to this job, with a loop index of type long.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Rule.task(Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given task to this rule's task group.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 TaskSpec.task(Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given task to this task specification's rule's task group.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 Rule.task(int copies, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given number of copies of the given task to this rule's task group.
      <T extends Task> 
      TaskSpec      		 TaskSpec.task(int n, Class<T> taskClass)
      Add the given number of copies of the given task to this task specification's rule's task group.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BCASmp
      Class BCASmp is an SMP parallel program that computes the evolution of a binary cellular automaton (CA).
      class  CCASeq
      Class CCASeq is a sequential program that calculates the evolution of a continuous cellular automaton and stores the result in a grayscale PNG image file.
      class  CCASmp
      Class CCASmp is an SMP parallel program that calculates the evolution of a continuous cellular automaton and stores the result in a grayscale PNG image file.
      class  HamCycSeq
      Class HamCycSeq is a sequential program that finds a Hamiltonian cycle in a graph via exhaustive search.
      class  HamCycSmp
      Class HamCycSmp is a multicore parallel program that finds a Hamiltonian cycle in a graph via exhaustive search.
      class  MandelbrotSeq
      Class MandelbrotSeq is a sequential program that calculates the Mandelbrot Set.

      Class MandelbrotSeq3 is a sequential program that calculates the Mandelbrot Set.

      Class MandelbrotSmp3 is an SMP parallel program that calculates the Mandelbrot Set.

      Class MineCoinSmp is an SMP parallel program that does a simplified version of Bitcoin mining.
      class  MinVerCovSeq
      Class MinVerCovSeq is a sequential program that finds a minimum vertex cover of a graph via exhaustive search.

      Class MinVerCovSeq2 is a sequential program that finds a minimum vertex cover of a graph via exhaustive search.

      Class MinVerCovSeq3 is a sequential program that finds a minimum vertex cover of a graph via heuristic search.

      class  MinVerCovSmp3
      Class MinVerCovSmp3 is an SMP parallel program that finds a minimum vertex cover of a graph via heuristic search.
      class  PiSeq
      Class PiSeq is a sequential program that calculates an approximate value for π using a Monte Carlo technique.
      class  PiSmp
      Class PiSmp is an SMP parallel program that calculates an approximate value for π using a Monte Carlo technique.
      class  PiSmp2
      Class PiSmp2 is an SMP parallel program that calculates an approximate value for π using a Monte Carlo technique.
      class  PrimeSeq
      Class PrimeSeq is a sequential program that tests numbers for primality.
      class  PrimeSmp
      Class PrimeSmp is an SMP parallel program that tests numbers for primality.
      class  StatTestSeq
      Class StatTestSeq is a sequential program that performs a statistical test on a pseudorandom number generator.
      class  StatTestSmp
      Class StatTestSmp is a multicore parallel program that performs a statistical test on a pseudorandom number generator.
      class  TotientSeq
      Class TotientSeq is a sequential program that computes the Euler totient of a number.

      Class TotientSmp is an SMP parallel program that computes the Euler totient of a number.
